wardance.command.setSkillfalse: %1$s can no longer equip or use %2$s
wardance.command.clearSkilltrue: %1$s can no longer equip or use any skills
wardance.command.clearSkillfalse: %1$s can now equip and use all skills
gamerule.lockWarSkills: 默認鎖定技能（可用指令單個解鎖）
wardance.tooltip.parry: 至多招架%s 次攻擊且有%.2d 秒冷卻
wardance.tooltip.resetStyle2: 左擊顯示流派信息。重置流派請先清空當前技能選項
wardance.tooltip.resetStyle3: 左擊顯示流派信息，右擊重置流派和所有裝備的技能
wardance.skill: 選擇施放技能（僅限戰鬥模式）
wardance.bindCast: 施放綁定技能（僅限戰鬥模式）
wardance.skill.conflict: 當前在使用不兼容的技能
wardance.category.none.name: 所有技能
wardance.category.general.name: 通用
wardance.category.dominance.name: 霸者
wardance.category.dominance.desc: 十步殺一人，千里不留行
wardance.category.resolution.name: 守衛
wardance.category.subterfuge.name: 突襲
wardance.category.fervor.name: 連擊
wardance.category.perception.name: 洞察
wardance.category.perception.desc: 全知之眼下的天羅地網
wardance.category.decay.name: 衰敗
wardance.skill.mark.desc: 不可通過非指定手段驅散，可通過對準目標查看其當前所有標記。
wardance.skill.instant_cast.desc: 只需要將鼠標移到圖標上即可施放
wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc: 需要在戰鬥模式下選定後執行特定行動
wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc: 需要在戰鬥模式下選定後按下施放鍵（默認鼠標中鍵）
wardance.skill.taken_damage.desc: 計算藥水效果、護甲等減免前的傷害
wardance.skill.received_damage.desc: 計算藥水效果、護甲等減免後的傷害
wardance.skill.enemies.desc: 正在攻擊你的團隊的生物，或你的團隊正在攻擊的生物。無防備的生物和攻擊非盟友目標的生物不算作敵人
wardance.skill.allies.desc: 寵物、寵物主人、團隊成員、pvp時包括所有玩家
wardance.skill.aux_attack.desc: 每%d秒使你的普攻追加一次攻擊，造成%d傷害和%d架勢傷害
wardance.skill.true_damage.desc: 不計算藥水效果、護甲等減免效果
wardance.skill.recover.desc: 不計算治療加成和禁療
wardance.skill.heal.desc: 計算治療加成和禁療，不計算恢覆加成
wardance.skill.silence.desc: 被沉默的目標無法叫喊和使用吟唱技能
wardance.skills_style:
在左邊的名單裏選擇一個流派查看其核心技能，在右側裝備後解鎖其他技能槽。
技能根據大致玩法擁有自己的顏色，有些流派會{限制可裝備的技能顏色; YELLOW}。一般來說{限制較大; GOLD}的流派會擁有更加{強力的核心效果; GOLD}，而{限制較小; AQUA}的流派可能擁有{較弱效果; AQUA}甚至{負面效果; RED}。
wardance.skills_general:
選擇左側的技能查看其描述和副技能，選擇副技能後點擊右側的{灰色技能槽; GRAY}將其裝備進技能欄。右擊技能槽清空該槽裝備的技能。
技能描述可能包括顏色高亮，鼠標移動至{斜體; ITALIC, GOLD; 提供詞條描述}和{橫線; UNDERLINE, GOLD; 提供具體數據}字體可獲得額外信息。
wardance.skill_soft_incompat: Cannot be cast with skills tagged as:
wardance.skill_hard_incompat: Cannot be equipped with skills tagged as:
wardance.sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
wardance.sleight_of_hand.desc:
You may only equip {white, BOLD} skills. 
If a cast skill belongs to an archetype, it will randomly trigger the effects of another skill within the archetype instead.
wardance.survivor.name: 不滅
wardance.survivor.desc:
你只可以裝備1個顏色。
{受到; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}致命傷害時會消耗2威進入不滅狀態10秒。該狀態下{無法治療; RED}、{無法獲得威; RED}、{免疫所有傷害; DARK_GREEN}。結束後根據該狀態下的殺敵數目{恢復; DARK_GREEN, ITALIC; wardance.skill.recover.desc} {生命; DARK_GREEN, UNDERLINE; 10% for each entity, or all for a player}。
wardance.wind_scar.name: 風如刀割
wardance.wind_scar.desc:
你可以裝備2個顏色。
攻擊距離+1
近戰和技能傷害根據你和目標的距離增加破甲，每1格距離無視15%護甲。
wardance.timberfall.name: 一木破天
wardance.timberfall.desc:
你可以裝備2個顏色。
施放技能3秒內你的下一次普攻會造成40%額外架勢和生命傷害，且算作技能傷害。
若該傷害破防目標，使其額外獲得一個破綻。
wardance.frost_fang.name: 決堤之水
wardance.frost_fang.desc:
你可以裝備2個顏色。
幸運+2
每4秒若沒有攻擊則獲得20%額外傷害，最大100%。
攻擊後2秒失去該加成。
wardance.flame_dance.name: 星火燎原
wardance.flame_dance.desc:
你可以裝備2個顏色。
每5次攻擊造成70%額外傷害並獲得1靈。普攻和技能會標記敵人，最大50層。每層增加受到的傷害。
滿威時改爲引爆印記造成傷害，單次引爆的越多造成的傷害越高。
wardance.boulder_brace.name: 堅若磐石
wardance.boulder_brace.desc:
你可以裝備2個顏色。
架勢冷卻速度+50%
沒有移動時架勢恢覆+50%
被破防或擊倒時自動消耗1威取消該次破防。
wardance.walk_of_dionysus.name: Walk of Dionysus
wardance.hopping_mad.name: Hopping Mad
wardance.hopping_mad.desc:
You may equip up to 3 colors. 
Your max posture is halved, but you recover half of lost posture after landing from a jump.
wardance.blood_tax.name: Blood Tax
wardance.blood_tax.desc:
You may equip up to 4 colors. 
All skills using spirit will instead consume half that amount in health.
wardance.unstable_spirit.name: Unstable Spirit
wardance.unstable_spirit.desc:
You may equip up to 4 colors. 
Upon casting a skill, create a non-griefing and indiscriminate explosion.
wardance.gamblers_whimsy.name: Gambler's Whimsy
wardance.gamblers_whimsy.desc:
You may equip up to 5 colors. 
Only one of your active skills is enabled. One more skill is enabled for every level of might you have. The list of enabled skills are randomly refreshed after every skill cast.
wardance.sifu.name: Sifu
wardance.sifu.desc: You may equip any skill that is not {purple, DARK_PURPLE, BOLD}.
archetype.heavy_blow.name: 重擊
archetype.heavy_blow.desc:
{暴擊; GOLD}可以破盾；若暴擊被其他物品招架，束縛招架用的手1.5秒。
三次攻擊後冷卻。
「重擊」和目標的「不動」會相互抵消。
wardance.vital_strike.name: 會心一擊
wardance.silencer.name: 窒息
wardance.silencer.desc:
攻擊無防備目標時暴擊、束縛目標雙手、並{沉默; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.silence.desc}該目標。
五次攻擊後冷卻，若擊殺被沉默的目標則立刻刷新。
wardance.poise.name: Poise
wardance.stagger.name: 威壓
wardance.stagger.desc:
{暴擊; GOLD}：
束縛目標雙手1.5秒
暴擊不造成額外傷害但架勢傷害受到雙倍加成
三次攻擊後冷卻。
「威壓」和目標的「不動」會相互抵消。
wardance.leverage.name: 扭矩
wardance.leverage.desc: 暴擊傷害根據你和目標的距離改變，最多300%。
wardance.momentum.name: 慣性
wardance.momentum.desc: 無法自然暴擊。每（8-評分）次攻擊{自動暴擊;GOLD}。暴擊傷害+0.5%，架勢傷害+0.01，每級評分效果{翻倍;GOLD}。
archetype.iron_guard.name: 不動
archetype.iron_guard.desc:
招架獲得額外效果。4秒後冷卻。
「不動」和攻擊者的「重擊」會相互抵消。
wardance.return_to_sender.name: 回敬
wardance.return_to_sender.desc: 招架拋射物時消耗50%額外架勢將其反彈回攻擊者的方向。
wardance.afterimage.name: 殘影
wardance.afterimage.desc: 潛行招架近戰攻擊時{致盲;GRAY}（架勢傷害）範圍內的{敵人; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc}，然後隱身1秒。10秒冷卻。
wardance.backpedal.name: 卸力
wardance.backpedal.desc: 空中招架時傷害轉換爲{擊退;AQUA}。4秒冷卻。
wardance.mikiri.name: 見切
wardance.mikiri.desc: {招架免費;DARK_GREEN}。7秒後冷卻，每次攻擊和招架減少一秒。
wardance.overpower.name: 反擊
wardance.overpower.desc:
反彈架勢傷害並用招架物品對目標造成一次架勢傷害。
需要架勢回滿才能完全冷卻。
wardance.recovery.name: 恢復
wardance.recovery.desc: 架勢低於25%時招架不會暫停架勢恢復。
archetype.coup_de_grace.name: 斬殺
archetype.coup_de_grace.desc:
開啓後對看破目標造成其已損失生命20%的{真實傷害; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}並立刻結束其看破狀態。
若目標可被該技能擊殺（有標記提示），則所有對其造成的傷害轉換爲等量的架勢傷害。
再次釋放可關閉此技能。
釋放3個其他技能後冷卻，需要2威。
wardance.decapitate.name: 斬首
wardance.decapitate.desc: 若斬殺成功則{必定掉落目標的頭;GOLD}，若沒有頭則+3{搶奪等級;GOLD}。
wardance.rupture.name: Rupture
wardance.rupture.desc:
Drain half of the target's spirit to create a large explosion. The size of the explosion increases with the target's max posture, and its damage increases with the target's spirit.
[stats]
Explosion radius: sqrt(max posture)
Explosion damage: (spirit before drain) *2
wardance.reinvigorate.name: 敗者食塵
wardance.reinvigorate.desc: 被動。破防目標時對其造成1點{真實傷害; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}，每破防一次該目標傷害翻倍。
wardance.reaping.name: 收割
wardance.reaping.desc:
{綁定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}：
開啓後下次普攻會使所有周圍的目標進入警惕狀態，然後進行一次無法抵擋的攻擊，造成（10%最大生命）+（攻擊傷害）傷害。
低於該生命的目標將受到{真實傷害; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}。若擊殺任何目標則{立刻刷新; DARK_GREEN}此技能，否則進入6個技能的冷卻。
wardance.frenzy.name: 狂怒
wardance.frenzy.desc: 觸發後刷新所有物理技能。
wardance.danse_macabre.name: 死亡之舞
wardance.danse_macabre.desc: 已損失生命百分比傷害根據評分提高到最多40%。
archetype.kick.name: 飛踢
archetype.kick.desc:
{綁定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。
對3方塊內的目標造成4點架勢傷害和2點掉落傷害。
4次攻擊後冷卻，需要1靈。
wardance.trample.name: 踐踏
wardance.trample.desc: 若增加{2架勢;GRAY}可以破防目標，則增加2架勢傷害並將破防升級爲{擊倒; GRAY}。
wardance.shadowless_kick.name: 無影腳
wardance.shadowless_kick.desc:
{綁定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。
施放後每0.25秒飛踢一次，對3方塊內的目標造成2架勢傷害，1掉落傷害和較小的擊退。
該效果最多{重複;GOLD}7次，若無法選定目標則直接結束。
6次攻擊後冷卻，需要2靈。
wardance.tackle.name: 衝撞
wardance.tackle.desc: +2距離並向前輕微突進，半秒內{免疫;DARK_GREEN}所有傷害。
wardance.tornado.name: 掃堂腿
wardance.tornado.desc: 飛踢所有範圍內的目標。
wardance.sabaton_smash.name: 霸王脫鞋
wardance.sabaton_smash.desc: 消耗1架勢大幅度擊退目標，若目標{撞上牆體;AQUA}則額外造成（護甲/4）的掉落和架勢傷害。
wardance.backflip.name: 後空翻
wardance.backflip.desc: 後退並{治療; ITALIC, DARK_GREEN; wardance.skill.heal.desc}30%已損失架勢，獲得0.4評分。
archetype.grapple.name: 擒拿
archetype.grapple.desc:
{預備技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}。對同一目標進行兩次空手攻擊後造成7點真實架勢傷害。
該技能若破防目標，將該次破防升級爲{擊倒; GRAY}。
7次攻擊後冷卻，消耗2靈。
wardance.throw.name: 投擲
wardance.throw.desc:
若成功擊倒目標則舉起目標並刷新此技能，持續至擊倒結束爲止。
{綁定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}：若有生物騎着你，將其向視線方向投擲。若其{撞牆;GOLD}則造成3掉落傷害和7架勢傷害。
wardance.suplex.name: 過肩摔
wardance.submission.name: 降伏
wardance.submission.desc: 額外從目標汲取{架勢; UNDERLINE; 等於25%當前護甲}。若目標被破防則返還1靈。
wardance.cursed_palms.name: 替罪
wardance.cursed_palms.desc: 額外將自身一個{負面效果;LIGHT_PURPLE}轉移至目標身上。
wardance.wrestle.name: 強人鎖男
wardance.wrestle.desc:
{綁定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。雙手均爲空手消耗1威和2靈使一個範圍3內的目標獲得10層{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}。被{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}的目標{攻速;GOLD}-30%、{受到架勢傷害;GOLD}+20%、試圖逃脫時會被{拉向施加者;GOLD}、且所有{破防升級爲擊倒;GOLD}。
{同時你的移動速度減半。; RED}
對目標造成傷害或目標造成傷害時印記層數-1，若成功對印記施加者造成傷害則{印記層數-3;RED}。
{印記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}層數爲0時、或10秒經過後、或施加者不再空手時自動結束，之後進入10秒冷卻。
archetype.shield_bash.name: 盾擊
archetype.shield_bash.desc:
{預備技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}。你的下一次盾牌攻擊附帶額外效果
7次招架後冷卻，需要1靈。
wardance.pummel.name: 劍盾
wardance.pummel.desc: 被動。副手持盾時獲得獲得一個{6/0/盾牌架勢傷害的附屬攻擊; ITALIC, UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.aux_attack.desc;6,0,盾牌架勢傷害}。
wardance.rim_punch.name: 猛衝
wardance.rim_punch.desc: 不造成額外架勢傷害，改爲根據屏障擊退目標並附帶3秒反胃。
wardance.overbear.name: 泰山壓頂
wardance.foot_slam.name: 碾壓
wardance.foot_slam.desc: 攻擊目標的腿部，使其獲得（架勢傷害*2）秒的緩慢和{混亂; ITALIC; 攻擊混亂目標時獲得分心傷害加成}。
wardance.berserk.name: 狂戰
wardance.berserk.desc: 釋放和攻擊後刷新雙手冷卻且（架勢傷害*2）秒內增加30%攻速。
wardance.lockdown.name: 封鎖
wardance.lockdown.desc: 不造成額外架勢傷害，改爲{束縛;DARK_GREEN}目標雙手（屏障冷卻/2）秒。
archetype.feint.name: 佯攻
archetype.feint.desc:
{預備技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}。下一次攻擊返還一半冷卻、{束縛;DARK_GREEN}目標雙手1秒並{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}6層。
施放時目標每層{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}{減少; RED}0.1秒束縛時間。每次對目標普攻減少一層標記。
3次攻擊後冷卻，需要4靈。
wardance.followup.name: 燕反
wardance.followup.desc: 返還所有冷卻。被動：攻擊雙手被束縛的目標時返還一半冷卻。
wardance.upper_hand.name: 過河拆橋
wardance.upper_hand.desc: 恢覆等量的架勢。減少目標2護甲10秒，獲得等量護甲。最多獲得20護甲。
wardance.smirking_shadow.name: 掠影
wardance.smirking_shadow.desc: 生效期間目標被視爲{無防備;GRAY}。
wardance.scorpion_sting.name: 蛇蠍之心
wardance.scorpion_sting.desc: 添加10秒中毒，然後使目標所有負面效果的強度增加1。
wardance.spirit_resonance.name: 靈力迴響
wardance.spirit_resonance.desc:
{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}的目標受到的{技能傷害; GOLD}+2，且技能傷害會額外移除一層標記
該效果有1秒內置冷卻。
wardance.capricious_strike.name: Capricious Strike
wardance.capricious_strike.desc: Attacking a {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} target reduces cooldown all other physical skills by 1.
archetype.prowess.name: 馬太效應
wardance.crown_champion.name: Crown Champion
wardance.crown_champion.desc: Gain 5% extra attack damage per level of might; your might gain is increased by 50%, decreasing by 5% per level of might.
wardance.vengeful_might.name: 不共戴天
wardance.vengeful_might.desc: 自己或10方塊內的盟友受到傷害時{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}攻擊者等同於{減免後; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}傷害的層數並使其發光。對有標記的目標造成傷害時消耗標記層數造成最多兩倍傷害並獲得等量的威。
wardance.prideful_might.name: 盛氣凌人
wardance.prideful_might.desc: 獲得{3倍的威;GOLD}但{受到傷害;RED;wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}時清空所有威。每獲得2層威，{偏轉;GOLD}會立刻冷卻。
wardance.hidden_might.name: Hidden Might
wardance.hidden_might.desc: Gain 0.25 might from an unaware attack. The distance at which you are detected is reduced by 30%; for every level of might you gain, 3% of this detection is converted to speed.
wardance.elemental_might.name: Elemental Might
wardance.elemental_might.desc: Attacking a target causes it to take (might/3) more damage from non-physical sources for the next 5 seconds; gain 1 might when an entity in 5 blocks dies from non-physical damage.
wardance.masters_might.name: Master's Might
wardance.masters_might.desc: When attacking a target without knockback immunity, slow others nearby for half a second and render the hit target immune to knockback for 5 seconds, gaining 1 might. Cannot attack stunned targets, but greatly knocks back on stun ignoring immunity. Upon dealing fatal damage, cancel the damage and stun the target for 6 seconds instead. After recovering, the target will run away, dropping triple the normal exp and no loot.
archetype.judgment.name: Judgment
wardance.amputation.name: Amputation
wardance.brutalize.name: Brutalize
wardance.brutalize.desc: Might cost per cast increased to 5. Intimidate hostile targets in a 10 block radius on every cast, causing them to take 20% more posture damage from you for 10 seconds. Successfully judging a target stuns it for double the usual time, nearby enemies with less health than the judged target are compelled to flee in fear.
wardance.viral_decay.name: 爆炸病毒
wardance.viral_decay.desc:
{標記; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}一個可以觸及的目標，每秒造成{真實傷害; GRAY, UNDERLINE; 等同於層數}。
目標死亡或被引爆時對半徑3方塊內的非{友方; AQUA, ITALIC; wardance.skill.allies.desc}單位造成2點{真實傷害; RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}，並添加一層{標記; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}。
消耗2威。
wardance.fever_dream.name: Fever Dream
wardance.fever_dream.desc: Upon successfully judging a target, compel entities in a 7 block radius to attack each other randomly. If this affects another {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} entity, they will repeat this effect. The effect can be chained up to 3 times.
wardance.lichtenberg_scar.name: Lichtenberg Scar
wardance.lichtenberg_scar.desc: Each cast deals no extra damage but only costs 1 might and 1 second of cooldown. Successfully judging a target deals 20% current health electric damage and summons lightning above all other {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} targets in a 30 block radius, dealing 10% current health as electric damage.
wardance.combo_breaker.name: Combo Breaker
wardance.combo_breaker.desc: Can only be cast once per 10 seconds. The {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} is also refreshed by casting skills on the target, and lasts 5 seconds regardless of stack. When the mark expires or you cast over 10 skills on the target, deal (4*skills cast on target)% current health damage.
archetype.memento_mori.name: 視死如歸
wardance.bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
wardance.bloodlust.desc: For every 1% health lost, you gain 2% extra might and 1% extra damage.
wardance.rapid_clotting.name: 血甲
wardance.rapid_clotting.desc: 獲得（已損失生命比率*20）的護甲。
wardance.shadow_dive.name: 影遁
wardance.shadow_dive.desc:
{受到; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}超過當前生命25%的傷害時將該傷害降至當前生命的25%，然後進入8秒影遁狀態，獲得{隱身和速度;AQUA}。
影遁狀態下第一個觸碰或攻擊的生物會代替你你成爲其他敵人的攻擊目標。
生命滿後冷卻。
wardance.necrosis.name: 外強中乾
wardance.necrosis.desc:
根據評分{增加; UNDERLINE; 每層評分+14%}最大生命。
{你的當前生命不會超過你真正的最大生命; RED}
wardance.static_discharge.name: 靜電
wardance.static_discharge.desc: {受到; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}傷害時蓄電，最多（最大生命/5）。攻擊時消耗電量對5方塊內的敵人造成等量的{電擊;AQUA}傷害和擊退。
wardance.pound_of_flesh.name: 以牙還牙
wardance.pound_of_flesh.desc: {瞬發技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}，消耗所有靈。攻擊時{消耗自身10%最大生命;RED}，若目標招架該次攻擊則額外造成其15%{最大架勢;GOLD}的架勢傷害，否則造成其{最大生命;GOLD}7%的傷害。靈恢復至最大值或（消耗的靈*4）秒後結束狀態。
archetype.descend.name: Descend
wardance.fatal_falls.name: Fatal Falls
wardance.fatal_falls.desc: Additionally deals (fall distance) falling block damage.
wardance.fatal_falls.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance.hawk_dive.name: Phantom Dive
wardance.hawk_dive.desc: Can be cast while airborne. Every 7 blocks fallen upgrades the attack's ambush tier (alert->distracted->unaware); every upgrade beyond unaware paralyzes the target for for 3 seconds.
wardance.lights_out.name: Lights Out
wardance.lights_out.desc: If the target is staggered by this attack, it will be blinded and stagger time will be lengthened to 10 seconds, but stagger count will be set to 1.
wardance.lights_out.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance.shockwave.name: Shockwave
wardance.shockwave.desc: No effects on attack. Landing will create a shockwave that throws all entities within 5 blocks upwards slightly, deals (fall distance/2) posture damage and 1 falling block damage, and slows their posture regeneration by 40% for 2 seconds after posture cooldown has elapsed, negating fall damage.
wardance.shockwave.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance.titanfall.name: Titanfall
wardance.titanfall.desc: Consumes all of your own posture and deal it as additional damage to the target, increased by 4% per armor point you have.
wardance.titanfall.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
archetype.hex.name: 詛咒
archetype.hex.desc: {綁定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。{標記; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}一個可被觸及的目標。需要1靈，15秒後冷卻。
wardance.curse_of_misfortune.name: 厄運咒
wardance.curse_of_misfortune.desc:
使目標的{幸運; AQUA}降低2。
當你幸運{判定失敗; AQUA}時，使下一次「厄運咒」的效果+1，最多可使目標幸運-13。
wardance.curse_of_echoes.name: 迴音咒
wardance.curse_of_echoes.desc: 8秒內目標受到物理傷害時，額外對其造成40%的{真實傷害; ITALIC, RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}，該效果有1秒內置冷卻。
wardance.itchy_curse.name: 乾癬咒
wardance.itchy_curse.desc:
使目標瘙癢3秒，該效果只有在靜止不動時會減少時長。
每三秒，目標會{喪失行動能力;DARK_GREEN}1秒，且雙手會被{束縛;DARK_GREEN}。
wardance.gangrene.name: Gangrene
wardance.gangrene.desc: For the next 8 seconds, the target loses the ability to heal for 2 seconds after taking non-physical damage.
wardance.unravel.name: 散魔咒
wardance.unravel.desc: 引爆目標所有能被牛奶{驅散;GOLD}的效果，使他們減少一層強度。{爆炸;GOLD}大小爲7方塊半徑，造成6傷害。
wardance.black_mark.name: Black Mark
wardance.black_mark.desc: Saps the target of its vitality. For 10 seconds, any creature that deals melee damage to the target will heal for 1/3 the damage dealt and drain either 2 posture or 3 spirit, whichever the attacker has less of, and recover half that amount.
wardance.petrify.name: 石化咒
wardance.petrify.desc:
5秒內使目標減速30%，然後將其{石化;GRAY}3秒。
石化的生物被視爲{無防備;GRAY}，但增加7護甲。
被動：對石化目標造成傷害時產生一次石粉爆炸，對目標7方塊內的非友方目標造成5架勢傷害和衰弱。
archetype.morale.name: 士氣
archetype.morale.desc: 達成特定要求時恢復靈。
wardance.back_and_forth.name: Back and Forth
wardance.archers_paradox.name: 箭在弦上
wardance.archers_paradox.desc:
攻擊{非警惕;AQUA}目標或{拋射物;AQUA}擊中目標時恢復1靈。
該效果有3秒的冷卻。
wardance.confidence.name: Confidence
wardance.confidence.desc: The more spirit you have, the faster your spirit regeneration, to a limit of 200% speed at max spirit and 50% speed at none.
wardance.natural_sprinter.name: 一鼓作氣
wardance.natural_sprinter.desc:
最大靈{翻倍;GOLD}，靈恢復速度爲正常的1/3。
{擊殺;GOLD}目標時恢復3靈。
wardance.speed_demon.name: Speed Demon
wardance.speed_demon.desc: Halve spirit cooldown on a dodge and regain spirit on attack based on speed. The faster you are compared to your target, the more spirit is regenerated, capped at 1.
wardance.lady_luck.name: 流局滿貫
wardance.lady_luck.desc: 釋放技能時有（1+幸運）/（5+幸運）{概率;GREEN}（最低20%）{不消耗靈;GREEN}，概率{疊加;GREEN}到觸發爲止。
